about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'A Young Housewife' story from 'Obedient Women'.

A Young Housewife

HEROINE:
Ria Naeho
A young housewife with a strong libido who's looking for some hard sex.

SYNOPSIS (A Young Housewife)


Her husband is very gentle and never gets angry with anyone.
She projects the image of a put-together and rich young wife who is happy to be spoiled by her husband.
She loves her husband but actually has a secret adventure in mind.
There aren't any supermarkets close to her home, but she has a crush on a cool delivery guy who often makes deliveries to her home.
As if he can read her mind, he strikes up a conversation with her at her front door. Then, one day, he forcibly kisses her and touches her wet crotch, before engaging in crazy sex with her.
Although he leaves quickly afterward, she doesn't ever turn him down whenever he delivers to her home. They repeatedly have sex together.
She feels reinvigorated after having sex with him for a second time, but persuades herself it's just, kind of, an adult secret in her mind.
They often meet and have sex.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.
